about.title: About
about.content: With over 15 years of web development experience since 2008, I specialize in building complex web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular. I'm passionate about creating exceptional UI/UX experiences that delight users. I believe in the power of motivated teams and maintain high standards for team communication and collaboration.
